basics.name: Mori Bellamy
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: A full stack generalist, I am comfortable making critical contributions all the way from the frontend through your backend business logic to the last system call of your RPC.

highlights: Wavefront is the next generation metrics monitoring and alerting platform. Logs shouldn't be the first place you check for application health.
Bug fixes and features for ingestion, alerting, querying, and user management.
Production critical tooling and services, including operational dashboard for immediately and programatically remediating customer cluster issues.
Deep knowledge of entire release/QA/development/operational process.
Core member of interview panel in growing the dev team from 6 to 12 engineers.

[Waze Carpool](https://www.waze.com/carpool/). Implemented the intelligent pricing engine for deciding how much drivers are offered for giving a passenger a ride. Data driven engine with many parameters optimized on acceptance rate.
[VM based python runtime for AppEngine](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/flexible/), allows users to embrace containerization while still accessing the AppEngine PaaS.
[Borg](https://research.google.com/pubs/pub43438.html), which is Google's internal predecessor to Kubernetes. Wrote system and integration test framework.
